scripts.//: We do not include vscode/ in npm workspaces because vsce does not support it. We use concurrently instead of npm -ws because it has nicer output.
scripts.start: concurrently "cd ui && npm run _start" "cd node-http && npm start"
scripts.test: rm -f node-http/_test.db && concurrently --names "ui,server,test" --success "command-test" --kill-others "cd ui && npm run _start" "cd node-http && DB_PATH=_test.db npm start" "cd ui && npm run _test"
scripts.test:debug: rm -f node-http/_test.db && concurrently --names "ui,server,test" --success "command-test" --kill-others "cd ui && npm run _start" "cd node-http && DB_PATH=_test.db npm start" "cd ui && npm run _test:debug"
